description: Update an existing native app release.
permissions: Only admin users can update native app releases (policy requires is_admin?).
side_effects: Updates a native app release record release channel details and notes.
validation_notes: Requires a native app release <id> argument. At least one writable attribute must be provided or the request fails. If --release-channel-details is provided, it must be a non-empty JSON array and each object channel and status must be in the server defined enums.

flags.name: --release-channel-details
flags.validation: If provided, must be a non-empty JSON array of objects; each object channel and status must be valid server enums.
